attributes.action: make landowners who charge for parking,responsible for the safety of the vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to make a law that
if company's and hospitals etc:,are charging people to park their vehicles on their land.then these people should be responsible for any damage or theft from or to vehicle's.
instead of using the cop out of parking at your own risk,even though they charge you for it.
